text: Ðry dagas synd onXIImonðum, þa synd swiðe unhalwende monnum oððe nytenum blod on to forlætene oððe drenc to drincane.
Þæt is se æftemæste monandæg on Aprilis, ær he gange of tune, and se forma monandæg on Agustusmonað, and se æftemæste monandæg on Decembermonað, ær he gange of tune.
Seðe on ðamIIImonandagum mon oððe nytene blod forlæteð, on þone ðridan dæg he sceal sweltan, oððe he ne gebiðeð þæs seofðan dæges.
And gif he drinc drinceð to læcecrefte, ærXVdagan he sceal sweltan.
And gif hwylc man acenned bið on þissumIIIdagum, he sceal sweltan yfele deaðe.
And seðe et goseflæsc on þissonIIIdagan, ærXLdæge he sceal sweltan.
